activities: We We process credit card payments using a token provided by a PCI certified payment gateway and store customer information in a secure database.  Information is used for use with our anti-fraud services and for shipping products to customer.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (for unresolved issues involving human ressources data being transferred from EU member countries to the US); JAMS (for all other unresolved issues)
